563920.name: Fantasy Grounds - The Last Parsec: Archetypes (Savage Worlds)
563920.description:
Bring the Known Races to your table!

Featuring brilliant art by Bryan Syme and MK Ultra, and with a cover by Chris Malidore, The Last Parsec Archetypes brings a baker's dozen of full-color, ready-to-play archetypes representing iconic JumpCorp crew members from all the core races of the Known Worlds. These may be used with The Last Parsec miniatures (coming soon) or with the enclosed Figure Flats!
Included are:
  • Human Team Leader
  • Rakashan Team Leader
  • Kalian Pilot
  • Deader Science Officer
  • Floran Science Officer
  • Artificial Being (Construct)
  • Human Scout
  • Insectoid Scout
  • Serran Psychic
  • Insectoid Psychic
  • Aurax Security
  • Yeti Security
  • Saurian Security
*** About The Last Parsec ***
Faster-than-light travel has finally allowed humanity to spread beyond its lonely corner of the Milky Way. In the depths of space these explorers found millions of star systems, strange planets, and exotic alien races. Centuries later, they form the Known Worlds, a vital region of trade and technology where empires grow and business thrives.
It is an unparalleled age. Cutting edge science has opened limitless frontiers of space and consciousness, and has even begun to hint at the mysteries of the universe itself. But to find them, one must travel beyond the familiar, to the last parsecs of reality.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Perry Chalmers
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds Adventure Edition ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
